title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Entrepreneurship with Established Organizations (EP 60030) Service strategies followed by established industries, Major share of the market, examination and evaluation of business practices and policies, Long term service markets where potential for growth is expected, understanding scope of innovations within an existing corporate structure and culture, stages of identification, initiation, launch, management, new department or subsidiary creation, spin-off and spinout strategies, mergers and acquisitions, integrations and sustainable growth.
